attributes.action: a place of remembrance for the victims of Covid 19 for families to go n honour
attributes.additional_details: I think if the England can show this respect to people in England of the lost they grieve for this should be done in Scotland as well Scotland needs a place for their families n loved ones too
attributes.background: lost lives of Covid 19 can go and put their name there as a way of remembrance they should get the dignity they deserve fighting for their life’s in this horrible pandemic and nearly brought the world to a standstill families could not give them the send off they deserved due to restrictions imposed

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same/a similar action:

Fund a memorial monument of all the people that have died from COVID 19
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576933
